MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh affecting properties in Bodfari, Llandyrnog and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line across the river near Lleweni Hall  and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.15PM on 25th January 2021
